channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 高管休假，业绩再次推迟，Chemours股价暴跌
item.description:
Chemours shares slump as top executives put on leave, results delayed again https://t.co/oaGo4Anu5w pic.twitter.com/No8xBPbovO

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 观看：今年迄今为止，英国房地产投资信托基金在空置办公空间和利率上升的双重夹击下表现惨不忍睹。AJ Bell 的拉斯-穆德（Russ Mould）从反面教材的角度告诉我们，投资者应该如何看待这个市场。
item.description:
WATCH: UK Real Estate Investment Trusts have done spectacularly badly so far this year, pinched by the dual headwinds of empty office space and higher interest rates. AJ Bell's Russ Mould gives us a contrarian’s view of how investors should view this market pic.twitter.com/3T2F77cStm

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 观看：🛫自全球健康危机以来，欧洲人又开始度假了。对许多人来说，重返海滩和城市度假也意味着重返天空。随着消费者涌向国外，欧洲两家主要航空公司的收入飙升
item.description:
WATCH: 🛫 Europeans have gone back on vacation since the global health crisis. And a return to beaches and city breaks also means a return to the skies for many. As consumers flocked abroad, revenues soared for two of Europe's leading airlines https://t.co/N5qrmAb3MW pic.twitter.com/cBUeHMqpSO

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 观看：全球最大的啤酒制造商百威英博的销售业绩超出预期，并将年度股息提高了 9%。但由于投资者权衡了缺乏新的股票回购和美国市场销售不佳的因素，该公司股价下跌了2%。
item.description:
WATCH: The world's largest brewer AB InBev beat sales forecasts and raised its annual dividend by nine percent. But the company saw shares drop two percent as investors weighed the absence of a new share buyback and poor US sales https://t.co/glJX97gXa4 pic.twitter.com/WA8bT2LFOg

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 渣打银行成为煤电厂资金投诉的目标
item.description:
Standard Chartered targeted in complaint over coal plant funding https://t.co/GuAh5dawry pic.twitter.com/Hjp6t0y42U

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 观看：作为市值最大的加密货币，比特币的交易价格约为 63000 美元，隔夜换手率较高。比特币的月涨幅超过 44%，是 2020 年 12 月以来的最大涨幅。
item.description:
WATCH: The largest cryptocurrency by market capitalisation, bitcoin was trading at around $63,000, having changed hands higher overnight. Its monthly gain is more than 44%, the largest since December 2020 https://t.co/6fnONPj8hZ pic.twitter.com/0mrsYWQexI

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

Breakingviews - Travel boom will lift IAG higher https://t.co/6CyNsV9l8J https://t.co/6CyNsV9l8J

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 观看：苹果公司因在人工智能方面似乎进展缓慢而受到投资者的抨击。批评者称，这家 iPhone 制造商落后于微软和谷歌等竞争对手，而这些公司正在其产品中使用人工智能技术。现在，苹果公司的老板蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）想要挑战这种想法。
item.description:
WATCH: Apple has been under fire from investors for seeming to go slow on AI. Critics say the iPhone maker is lagging rivals like Microsoft and Google, which are using the tech in their products. Now Apple boss Tim Cook wants to challenge that idea https://t.co/L5Ok6nefI1 pic.twitter.com/swPOd82UYC

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 观看：英国航空公司（British Airways）的所有者国际航空集团（IAG）和法荷航空（Air France-KLM）在旅游需求持续增长的背景下对2024年作出了积极展望，但这家法荷航空公司在年终遇到的麻烦凸显了该行业面临的一些挑战。
item.description:
WATCH: 🛫 British Airways owner IAG and Air France-KLM gave a positive outlook for 2024 on the back of sustained travel demand, but the Franco-Dutch carrier's year-end troubles highlighted some of the challenges the sector faces https://t.co/N5qrmAbBCu pic.twitter.com/Ds54jew7Me

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 观看：苹果公司老板蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）说，这家 iPhone 制造商看到了 "生成式人工智能令人难以置信的突破潜力，这也是我们目前在这一领域大力投资的原因"。
item.description:
WATCH: Apple boss Tim Cook said that the iPhone maker sees 'incredible breakthrough potential for generative AI, which is why we're currently investing significantly in this area' https://t.co/L5Ok6nefI1 pic.twitter.com/7j42POvRRh

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024
